texts.FileNotFound: The specified file does not exist!
texts.PathNotFound: The specified directory does not exist!
texts.FilePathNotFound: The file or directory does not exist!
texts.PathCannotBeDeletedWithNotEmpty: The specified directory is not empty and cannot be deleted!
texts.FilePathAlreadyExists: The same file or directory already exists in the specified path!
texts.UploadFileSizeBeyondLimit: Upload file size cannot exceed {0} MB!
texts.Description:FileLimitLength: Limit size of uploaded file in MB
texts.Description:AllowFileExtensions: List of allowed extensions to upload files, with multiple extensions separated by, don't need a notation
texts.Features:Description:DownloadFile: Whether to allow users to download files
texts.Features:Description:UploadFile: Whether to allow users to upload files
texts.Features:Description:MaxUploadFileCount: Limit the number of files a user uploads at a time
